duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage full-cycle recruitment efforts for Distribution Center positions, partnering with hiring managers to develop talent attraction strategies.
Promote diversity and inclusion, advocate for best-in-class candidate experience, and manage candidates in an online applicant tracking system.
Track key performance indicators for new hires, manage new employee activities, and resolve employee issues in an effective manner.
Deliver or coordinate new employee orientation, conduct exit surveys, and perform other HR duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent combination of education and work experience required
1-year experience in recruiting or human resources
Experience with applicant tracking systems, Workday preferred
